楲字的基本解释

楲
wēi
盛小便的器具：楲窬（盛大小便的器具，即便桶）。
连通蓄水池塘与灌溉沟渠的闸栅。

楲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wēi］
［《廣韻》於非切，平微，影。］
见“楲窬”。

楲字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　楲； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页541第14
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?於非切，音威。【說文】楲，窬，褻器也。【賈逵解·周官】楲，虎子也。古之受大小溲者，皆以虎子呼之。　又【玉篇】決塘木也。【類篇】通陂竇。

楲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
楲字的起名意思

暂无。

Tiao
Basic explanation of words
Tiao
wēi
Apparatus for holding urine: Tiaoyu (apparatus for holding urine, even a bucket).
The gate connecting the water storage pond and the irrigation ditches.
Tiao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wēi］
["Guangyun" Yu Feiqie, Ping Wei, Shadow. ]
See "Tiaoyu".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　楲; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 541 14
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Yu Feiqie, sound prestige. 【Speaking text】Tiao, 窬, obscene device. 【Jia Kui Jie·Zhou Guan】Tian, Hu Zi. In ancient times, those who received big and small dew were called tigers.　[Jade Chapter] Jue Tang Mu Ye. 【Classes】Tongbei sinus.
